notes: First mass-market Tesla sedan. 60-100 kWh battery pack options. 400V architecture. Ludicrous Mode on P100D (0-60 in 2.5 seconds). Over-the-air software updates. Autopilot introduced 2014. Up to 402-mile range. High-voltage EV system requires EV-certified technicians. Data sourced from Wikipedia Tesla Model S article, January 2025 revision.

First Tesla SUV with distinctive falcon-wing rear doors. 75-100 kWh battery pack. 400V architecture. Three-row seating for 6-7. Bioweapon Defense Mode air filtration. Ludicrous Mode available. Up to 351-mile range. Falcon-wing doors add mechanical complexity. High-voltage systems require specialized service. Data sourced from Wikipedia Tesla Model X article, January 2025 revision.

engines: EV Dual Motor AWD Long Range (346-450 hp)
notes: Mass-market affordable Tesla sedan. 50-82 kWh battery pack options. 400V architecture. Minimalist interior with 15-inch center touchscreen. Most affordable Tesla model. Best-selling premium sedan in USA. Up to 358-mile range. High-voltage EV system requires EV-certified technicians. Data sourced from Wikipedia Tesla Model 3 article, January 2025 revision.
